UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The cathelicidin-like peptide derived from panda genome is a potential antimicrobial peptide.
Literature.Author: Yan X, Zhong J, Liu H, Liu C, Zhang K, Lai R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:1% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter calcoaceticus(MIC=3.28µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=4.7µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=26.25-52.5µg/ml),Serratia marcescens(MIC=7.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1411(MIC=6.5µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi(MIC=75µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=6.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus sciuri 090312(MIC=1.2µg/ml),Staphylococcus haemolyticus(MIC=18.75µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=6.5µg/ml),Candida albicans 08030401(MIC=6.5µg/ml)
